paper.title: An analysis of the Hermes8 stream ciphers

author.org: Vodafone Group R&D, Newbury, United Kingdom#TAB#

paper.venue: Australasian Conference on Information Security and Privacy
paper.abstract: Hermes8 [6,7] is one of the stream ciphers submitted to the ECRYPT Stream Cipher Project (eSTREAM [3]). In this paper we present an analysis of the Hermes8 stream ciphers. In particular, we show an attack on the latest version of the cipher (Hermes8F), which requires very few known keystream bytes and recovers the cipher secret key in less than a second on a normal PC. Furthermore, we make some remarks on the cipheru0027s key schedule and discuss some properties of ciphers with similar algebraic structure to Hermes8.
